resources.string: Welcome! The green plus sign will allow you to create a new challenge. The stars beside your avatar represent achievement in terms of challenges completed in the amount of time you have been signed up.
This screen looks a lot like the "browse challenges" screen, except it displays the challenges you are involved with. Click on a challenge to see the latest updates.
Here, you can find a challenge to join. There is a green plus sign here to in case you get inspired and want to create a new challenge immediately.
Explore the graph that displays challenges completed per week, and updates made per week.
The title and location fields let you specify a title and location for the challenge. Frequency lets you set how often progress should be uploaded.
